title: Great moments in science: presented by Dr Karl Kruszelnicki
creator_credit: Andrew Horne, Deborah Szapiro, Karl Kruszelnicki and Freerange Animation
brief_description: Dr Karl Kruszelnicki presents four programs which attempt to de-mystify some of the great questions in science. All are presented chiefly in animation, and all manage to unravel the mystery in under 6 minutes.
